content: {"name": "Everlasting Joy Foundation", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Call to confirm which distribution site to pick-up food.\n- They may also have  furniture\u2019s, frozen foods (meats, fish, pork and chicken), toys, shoes, winter jackets, hygiene kits etc\n- For the latest updates, clients can follow us on all social media platforms @Everlasting Joy Foundation. For special requests, please feel free to call us at 301-283-7438.", "email": "", "url": "https://theeverlastingjoyfoundation.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "5170 Lawrence Place", "address_2": null, "city": "Hyattsville", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20781", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.9332411, "longitude": -76.92648779999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(301) 283-7438", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "21:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers and Clothes upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing and hygiene items may be available"}]}
